typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		RowId as integer,
		Retailer as string,
		SalesMonth as date,
		Product as string,
		SalesValueUSD as decimal(19,2),
		UnitsSold as integer,
		RunSeqNo as integer
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> source
source derive(ProductName = trim(left(Product,length(Product) - length(:WeightString))),
		WeightInOunces = toFloat(replace(:WeightString, :WeightUnit, '')) / iif(:WeightUnit=='g', 28.3495, 1.0),
		WeightInGrams = toFloat(replace(:WeightString, :WeightUnit, '')) / iif(:WeightUnit=='oz', 0.035274, 1.0),
		WeightString := right(Product,locate(' ', reverse(Product))-1),
		WeightUnit := iif(endsWith(Product, 'oz'), 'oz', 'g')) ~> SeparateProductWeight
SeparateProductWeight aggregate(groupBy(Product),
	ProductName = first(ProductName),
		each(match(startsWith(name,'Weight')), $$ = first($$))) ~> RemoveDuplicate
